headline: Is Evotec SE (EVO) One of the Best Debt-Free Penny Stocks to Buy Right Now?
summary: Evotec SE (NASDAQ:EVO) is one of the best debt-free penny stocks to buy right now. On January 8, the company’s Seattle-based subsidiary Just-Evotec Biologics received a new grant from the Gates Foundation. The grant is to be used to enable global access to the company’s biotherapeutics utilizing Evotec Biologics’ molecular design suite. The Gates Foundation […]
